column4: using ubuntu 10.0 here. sometimes my ubuntu crashs into a black screen or"fuzzy"screen then when restarting it flashs the screen sometimes i have to reset the computer more than 6 times before i can access ubuntu can anyone help?
Can you provide more information about what you were doing at the time of crash?
: i was on youtube
: i was on youtube but i got that problem playing urban terror
: sorry i was on youtube but i got that problem playing urban terror TOO
Was there any error message that you could submit as a error report?
: yep i got something like sending a report to the community but i havent done it:(
can t i take a look in logs files?
You should be able to find it there. :)
Hi osoleve
: i will try to find it there are lots of things in here
When you find it, pastebin it, and send me the link.
: what do you mean by pastbin it?
Paste the error message here: http://pastebin.com/
Then send me the link to your pastebin message so I can read it.
: ok i will try to find it this is my first time  in syslog and it is very messy
: may it be something about plymouthd
: may it be something about plymouthd?
: i dont know how to use log files, sorry thanks for your time anyway
i found this "strange" message before it crashed -   modem-manager: (net/ppp0): could not get port's parent device- dont know if its helpfull
im not sure but i think this problem happened in windows xp too
